dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Al; Aluminum; Aluminium-based compounds; Aluminum products; Alloyed aluminum; Semic; Alumix; Aluform; Alloy series names (e.g., 6061, 7075); Separated by semicolon.
Al; Aluminum; Aluminium-based compounds; Aluminum products; Alloyed aluminum; Semic; Alumix; Aluform; Alloy series names (e.g., 6061, 7075); Separated by semicolon.
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Aluminium and aluminium alloy products refer to items produced from aluminium and its alloys with other metals. The description encompasses the treatment processes they have undergone, such as casting, extruding, or rolling, compliance with industry standards, their quality grade, specific applications, production methods, and the primary raw material used. It also clarifies whether the products are distributed as part of a production or consumption mix and their point of availability, for instance, 'to consumer' or 'at plant'. The details are systematically listed and separated by commas.
铝及铝合金产品指的是由铝及其与其他金属合金化后制成的产品。这一描述包括它们所经历的处理过程，如铸造、挤压或轧制，符合行业标准，质量等级，具体用途，生产方法和所用的原始原料。它还澄清了产品是作为生产或消费混合物的一部分分配的，以及它们的可用性位置，例如'给消费者'或'在工厂'。详细内容系统地列出，并用逗号分隔。
